name: Bit Templates Playground
onCreateCommand: wget https://download.visualstudio.microsoft.com/download/pr/764f2fec-710d-490d-a341-88636bce1a8d/35fc13fc20161a7d196200d9c2c6a8f0/dotnet-sdk-8.0.100-rc.1.23463.5-linux-x64.tar.gz -O dotnet.tar.gz && export DOTNET_ROOT=$HOME/.dotnet && mkdir -p "$DOTNET_ROOT" && tar zxf dotnet.tar.gz -C "$DOTNET_ROOT" && export PATH=$PATH:$DOTNET_ROOT:$DOTNET_ROOT/tools && dotnet dev-certs https --trust && dotnet tool install --global dotnet-ef --version 8.0.0-rc.1.23419.6
